title: Multicenter Comparison of Cerner Sepsis Alerts to an Advanced AI General Early Warning Score for Identifying Sepsis in the Hospital

abstract: RATIONALE Consensus guidelines recommend sepsis screening and immediate administration of antimicrobials for patients thought to be septic. eCARTv5 is an FDA cleared AI/ML hospital early warning score trained to predict clinical deterioration (ie …
